results.name: Square array A(n,k), n >= 0, k >= 0, read by antidiagonals, where A(n,k) is Chebyshev polynomial of the first kind T_{n}(x), evaluated at x=k.
link: Index entries for sequences related to Chebyshev polynomials.
formula: A(0,k) = 1, A(1,k) = k and A(n,k) = 2 * k * A(n-1,k) - A(n-2,k) for n > 1.
A(n,k) = n * Sum_{j=0..n} (2*k-2)^j * binomial(n+j,2*j)/(n+j) for n > 0. - _Seiichi Manyama_, Mar 05 2021
mathematica: Table[ChebyshevT[n-k, k], {n, 0, 10}, {k, n, 0, -1}] // Flatten (* _Amiram Eldar_, Dec 28 2018 *)
program: matrix(7, 7, n, k, T(n-1,k-1)) \\ _Michel Marcus_, Dec 28 2018
(PARI) T(n, k) = if(n==0, 1, n*sum(j=0, n, (2*k-2)^j*binomial(n+j, 2*j)/(n+j))); \\ _Seiichi Manyama_, Mar 05 2021
